post.intro: Here is a list of labels that are on your account:
post.replyInstructions: Please reply with the numbers of the labels you want to remove separated by commas. For example, if you want to remove all of them, reply with: {{numberList}}
post.successLine1: Okay, I removed these labels from your account: {{labelNames}}
post.successLine2: If you ever want to add more labels, send me a post that says: {{labelCommand}}

error.commandNotAvailable: This command is not available at the moment. Please try again later.
error.noLabelsFound: Your account does not have any of our labels on it. If you want to add some, send me a post that says: {{labelCommand}}
error.invalidNumber: Not all of these choices are valid numbers. Can you please try again?
error.invalidChoices: Not all of these choices are valid. Can you please try again?
error.duplicateChoices: Not all of these choices are unique. Can you please try again?
error.labelsOutOfSync: The labels on your account have changed, so I'm going to create a new post for this. Can you please reply to this one instead:
